title: Riot girl tristana legit?
body: I was just wondering if it is legit on facebook, because around 2 years ago, my brother entered the code and got banned, but it was really the fb page official of Lol, so can someone just answer me pls. Ty!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: [Riot Girl Tristana ](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/app/208195102528120/)has been a longtime Facebook promotion, and totally legit!  This is not something you would get banned for!  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qJlpAxOJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T21:35:34.234+0000)
>
> [Riot Girl Tristana ](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/app/208195102528120/)has been a longtime Facebook promotion, and totally legit!  This is not something you would get banned for!  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you!
